name: Overlapping Circular Avatars
description: This plugin takes a comma-separated string of image URLs and generates HTML to display these images as overlapping circular avatars with inline CSS.
author: Glide Plugin Generator via Robert Petitto

params.name: imageURLs
params.description: A comma-separated list of image URLs.

result.name: htmlOutput
result.description: HTML code for displaying the images as overlapping circular avatars.
